pageContent: Aim: The usual morbidity after radical prostatectomy (RP) implies, the possible need for inflatable penile prosthesis (IPP). This study aims to validate the efficacy and safety of a sling called "Mini-Jupette" concomitantly with the implantation of an IPP that will counteract mild UI (<2 pads/day) associated or not with climacturia for patients resistant to non-invasive therapeutic approach.

metaData.source:
Health issues in men: part I: Common genitourinary disorders
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10892636/
